p: Nwokocha and collegues [ 9] reported the cardioprotective effects of the juice of Melicoccus bijugatus fruit pulp. Using a rat model of myocardial injury, the authors showed that a repeated treatment reduced blood pressure and heart rate as well as decreased heart to body weight ratio. Vitamin C and related compounds, phenolic acids, flavonoid, fatty acids and terpene derivatives were individuated as components.
